Text: ADS Issue separation of OOM and OOS Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst ADS users I have received numerous comments from TSWG regarding concerns about the planned implementation of the same service type for OOS and OOM type dispatches in ADS phase II Market Operations current position is that the Market Participants have all the information they need to decode OOS and OOM such as what has been bid what has been dispatched what proxy bids have been created based on available capacity etc However we will consider a change to separate the OOS and OOM dispatches In order to fully weigh the ramifications of this decision I want to solicit examplesscenarios where Market Participant systems would not be able to correctly settle against a combined OOSOOM dispatch through ADS If you are interested in this issue please strengthen your case by sending me an email with comments by I would especially like to see comments regarding how mustoffer fits in including issues with proxy bids and whether OOM will apply to must offer units Thanks Greg Ford California ISO Market Operations
